Parameters: TextPaint: the paint to be used for drawing This value must never be null.
TextDirectionHeuristic: the text direction heuristic for resolving bidi behavior This value must never be null.
setTextDirection(android.text.TextDirect.Description: Set the text direction heuristic. The default value is @B_android#text#TextDirectionHeuristics#FIRSTSTRONG_LTR_E@.

Parameters: PrecomputedText.Params: This value must never be null.

int: the hyphenation frequency Value is @B_android#text#Layout#HYPHENATION_FREQUENCY_NORMAL_E@, @B_android#text#Layout#HYPHENATION_FREQUENCY_FULL_E@, or @B_android#text#Layout#HYPHENATION_FREQUENCY_NONE_E@
setHyphenationFrequency(int).Description: Set the hyphenation frequency. The default value is @B_android#text#Layout#HYPHENATION_FREQUENCY_NORMAL_E@.

Returns: the layout parameter This value will never be null.

Parameters: int: the break strategy Value is @B_android#graphics#text#LineBreaker#BREAK_STRATEGY_SIMPLE_E@, @B_android#graphics#text#LineBreaker#BREAK_STRATEGY_HIGH_QUALITY_E@, or @B_android#graphics#text#LineBreaker#BREAK_STRATEGY_BALANCED_E@
setBreakStrategy(int).Description: Set the line break strategy. The default value is @B_android#text#Layout#BREAK_STRATEGY_HIGH_QUALITY_E@.
